channel.title: Partial RSS Feed
channel.description: An RSS feed with partial/missing fields for testing validation

item.title: Valid Post with All Fields
item.description: This post has all required fields and should be included in the output.

item.title: Post Missing Link
item.description: This post is missing the link field and should be skipped during processing.
This post is missing the title field and should be skipped during processing.

item.title: Post with Empty Title
item.description: This post has an empty title field.

item.title: Post with No Publication Date
item.description: This post has no publication date but should still be included since date is optional.

item.title: Another Valid Post
item.description: This is another valid post that should be included in the output.
